resources.string: We are a dedicated team of students from various universities in Indonesia, committed to promoting sustainable tourism and preserving the environment. Together, we aim to revolutionize the way people travel.\nOur team consists of :

• Tiara Puspita(ML) from Universitas Gunadarma
• EsterNunut Asihanna (ML) from Universitas Udayana
• Farhan Syarif(CC) from Universitas Muslim Indonesia
• Tri Indriani(CC) from Politeknik Negeri Batam
• Azhar Mohammad R.(MD) from Universitas Muslim Indonesia
• Rizal Rahmadani(MD) from Universitas Muslim Indonesia

Drawing from our diverse backgrounds in Machine Learning (ML), Cloud Computing (CC), and Mobile Development (MD), we combine our knowledge and skills to develop an innovative platform for eco-friendly travel.
Through the use of advanced technology and data analysis, we aim to provide personalized recommendations and seamless user experiences. Our goal is to make sustainable travel accessible, enjoyable, and impactful.
With a focus on promoting responsible tourism practices and raising awareness about environmental conservation, we aspire to inspire more people to travel sustainably and contribute to a better future.
Join us on this exciting journey as we create a platform that empowers travelers to explore the world while making a positive difference.
